Author: dietfreddo
Text: It doesn't really matter as long as you keep measuring with the same scale and it's consistent. I googled "cheap and accurate bathroom scales" (googling for digital scales got me stuff for weighing weed lmaoooo) and I found some options you'd be able to get through Amazon that don't seem terrible.
